version_description:
-You can now watch video ads to make upgrades faster!
-Upgrades that you have not yet reached are now unlockable using gems.
-Bug fixes and enhancements for a more pleasant experience.

If you like playing Vlogger Go Viral, don't forget to leave us a new rating or review. It helps us a lot!

- Minor fixes and revisions
- Add support to Portuguese and Spanish languages

if you like playing Vlogger Go Viral, don't forget to leave us a new rating or review. It helps us a lot!

- ALL-NEW VLOGGERS with AWESOME new outfits!
- More customization options for rooms: new colors and item upgrades!
- New pictures for your produced videos!
- Balance adjustments for crowns, hats and channels

If you like playing Vlogger Go Viral, don't forget to leave us a new rating or review. It helps us a lot!

- ALL-NEW VLOGGERS with AWESOME new outfits!
- More customization options for rooms: new colors and item upgrades!
- New pictures for your produced videos!
- Balance adjustments for crowns, hats and channels

- 1.3.2: Minor fixes and revision

If you like playing Vlogger Go Viral, don't forget to leave us a new rating or review. It helps us a lot!

- Vlogger Tasks! Earn coins and diamonds by completing goals
- Vlogger Events! Try your luck with haters, live stream videos and much more
- Tapping Tron! A new powerup available at the store
- All powerups effects improved
- Video topic screen redesigned, it looks so much better!
- Two newcomers vloggers outfits from Tapps Games!
- Earn diamonds with short videos

If you like playing Vlogger Go Viral, don't forget to leave us a new rating or review. It helps us a lot!

Sup, vloggers!
We have major news for you: special events!
That's right! Whether a sponsor offering to get you on an awesome trip or a new meme taking over the internet, you can now make videos about it and get exclusive prizes! GET HYPE!
We also made a bunch of tweaks to improve your vlogger career. What could be the next viral topic?
If you enjoy playing Vlogger Go Viral, don't forget to leave us a new rating or review. It helps us a lot!

Hallo! Salut! Здравствуйте! Merhaba!
Hey guys, is the translator on?
You read right! Now you can vlog in even more languages: we added support to French, German, Turkish and Russian!
A polyglot vlogger is a better vlogger.

We also made improvements to make playing even more fun. Stay tuned for more updates soon!
Now back to work, everyone!

<3 If you enjoy playing Vlogger Go Viral, don't forget to leave us a new rating or review. It helps us a lot! <3

Minor fixes and revisions.

If you like playing Vlogger Go Viral, don't forget to leave us a new rating or review. It helps us a lot!

Are you ready to travel?
Reach subscribers milestones to unlock new locations. It's time to start a vlogger career abroad! Also: get tons of bonus for that!

PLUS:
- New room upgrades featuring CATS!
- More variations for room upgrades! (oh, yeah)
- Performance improvements cause we love your device
- Did someone say play button awards? Wasn't me.

Check back soon for more updates ;)

If you enjoy playing Vlogger Go Viral don't forget to leave us a new rating or review. It helps us a lot!

What’s up, guys!
Here’s an awesome new update for your favorite Vlogger game!

Do you play every day?
Nice! Because active vloggers now get EVEN MORE views and subscribers, thanks to Daily Rewards!
Login every day and get tons of prizes.

PLUS:
- You asked, so here it is: the new Tapping Tron 2.0! It taps automatically for you! (oh yeah!)
- New idle reward feedback. Because popups are boring.
- A giant new Diamond Pack to make you the richest vlogger! $_$

Check back soon for more updates ;)

Hold tight, Vloggers. We have some big news!
*drumroll*
WARDROBE IS HERE!
We heard you and your sad, out of fashion vlogger now you have A WARDROBE MENU! Mix and match! Endless possibilities!
PLUS: the Pug store! Make Muny selling merchandise and trade for Diamonds. ENTREPRENEUR!
We also welcome a new designer to our team: say hi to Dias! We are all eager to know whether you enjoyed this update!
See you all soon! :D
Don’t forget to leave us a new rating or review. It helps us a lot! We love you!

Is your heart ready, vlogger?

First off... the TERRACE!
An all-new room to decorate with all-new upgrades!

PLUS:
- Livestreams! React to other vloggers’ streams and get views!
- A clumsy drone might visit you often to drop some goodies!
- KEEP EVERYTHING WHEN YOU TRAVEL! Now you're able to move out with all your room upgrades ;)

Also give a warm welcome to our new crew members: John and Kleber!
See you soon!
Don’t forget to leave us a new rating or review. It helps us a lot!

Feliz Natal, vloggers!

O ano chega ao fim mas ainda temos novidades!
Se prepare para AS LIGAS! Faça Viral Points para ser o melhor vlogger. Vença o líder. Passe de liga!
Inclui um monte de prêmios!

E MAIS:
- O evento de Natal chegou com roupas especiais!
- Está sentindo o ar mais frio? Parece que vem neve...

Vlogger Go Viral foi escolhido como um dos Melhores Jogos de 2016 no Google Play! Obrigada pelo apoio e gentileza durante o ano. Nos vemos em 2017!

We missed you really, really much. So here we are again!

One thing to unite vloggers all over the world... One thing to set a common goal... something is coming... soon.

PLUS:
- Fixed crashes reported by players. Thank you, vloggers!

"Woof (I also missed you.)" - The Pug

Are you guys enjoying the all-new global events?
Every once in a while, we'll drop a global milestone. If all players work together and reach the goal before the deadline, everybody wins a prize!
Stay tuned for more events!
PLUS:
- we reviewed the travel info to make it easier to understand
- exclusive avatar sets bonuses to each diamond pack purchase!
Give a warm welcome to Izadora, our new QA! Hi, Dora!
See you soon, vloggers!
Pro-tip #1: to become a famous vlogger, post videos every day.

Isn't Vlogger looking beautiful?
We made a lot of changes to the game's interface. Leave a review and tell us how you like it!
And big news: DELIVERIES!
Get new styles to customize your house and your vlogger by opening deliveries - with a Free Box for you every few hours.
PLUS:
- You have a name, I have a name and everything in your house also does ;)
- New styles for your bedroom! Hooray!
Pro-tip #8163: a good vlogger takes good care of his dog friend. This wasn't written by the Pug.

Isn't Vlogger looking beautiful?
We made a lot of changes to the game's interface. Leave a review and tell us how you like it!
And big news: DELIVERIES!
Get new styles to customize your house and your vlogger by opening deliveries - with a Free Box for you every few hours.
PLUS:
- You have a name, I have a name and everything in your house also does ;)
- New styles for your bedroom! Hooray!
Pro-tip #8163: a good vlogger takes good care of his dog friend. This wasn't written by the Pug.

Time for some Halloween vlogging!

SPOOKY BACKDROP: go viral on Halloween with eerie decorations for your room, like a coffin door, a mysterious witch and, of course, spider webs!

EXCLUSIVE HALOWEEN BUNDLE: don't miss this frighteningly awesome pack with views, diamonds and the scary clown and masked slasher skins!

Hey, vloggers! Today we’re gonna talk about cool new stuff!
-X-MAS IS SO ON: vlog with authentic X-mas spirit! Falling snow and a new Christmas-y soundtrack will bring that holiday magic to your vlogs!
-GIANT SNOWMAN ALERT: a new exclusive event to spice up your holidays!
-CHRISTMAS VIDEOS ARE BACK: make thematic vlogs by selecting a special video category!
-CHRISTMAS BUNDLE: get awesome holiday-themed items!
-Bug fixes and minor adjustments
Happy holidays, vloggers!

Hey, vloggers! Our Christmas event is now officially over! Thank you so much for all the awesome videos!
The following items and features are no longer available:
-Christmas-themed videos
-Christmas bundle
-Giant Snowman event
Stay tuned for more awesome events and keep vlogging!

Hey, vloggers! Our Christmas event is now officially over! Thank you so much for all the awesome videos!
The following items and features are no longer available:

-Giant Snowman event

"Hey, vloggers, what’s up? In today’s video we have BREAKING NEWS:

- A VLOG OF THRONES: compete with vlogger from the whole world for the chance to have your character sitting in the MASTER OF THE VLOGGERS THRONE!

- 4 NEW EVENTS: rise Atlantis from the ocean, rock amazing Zombie Makeup, teach pigasus how to fly, pitch hydraulic press against EVERYTHING and go viral with the latest sizzling vlogging trend - the LAVA BUCKET challenge!

A new vlogging season begins NOW!"

Hey guys, wassup? We have a bunch of news for all you vloggers out there:
- NEW ITENS: There's a bunch of new itens for your room to stand out on the tubersphere!
- SURPRISE BOX: Bigger! Better! And with more prizes!
- A VLOG OF THRONES: Learn more about out new bosses!

Don’t forget to leave us a new rating or review. It helps us a lot! We love you!
Maintenance Update: Bug fixes and general improvements.
Maintenance Update: Bug fixes and general improvements.

Hi, Vloggers, what's up? Our new update is out and it's just LIT!

We've fixed bugs and optimized your experience so you can get even more famous!

Vlog away!

Hi guys, what’s up? Time for a vlog about COOL NEW STUFF!

-3 NEW TOPICS: vlog about Entertainment, Travel and Activism to keep your content fresh!

-2 NEW EVENTS: post videos fast to retrieve the gifts stolen by the Kroompus and help Santa wrap gifts in time for Christmas!

-GET TRENDY: watch out for trending topics during events to get more points for every new vlog!

-NEW SKINS: just ‘cause a vlogger needs new outfits every now and then.

Don’t forget to subsc... I mean, give us review!

Hey, vloggers, what's up? We've got some surprises for your channels' holiday season!

-NEW SKINS: rock 4 new skins in your videos and give your fans even more reasons to make your content go viral!

Happy holidays, vloggers!

Hey Vloggers!

In this update, we've fixed a major bug that prevented the game from displaying correctly and full screen on all devices. Now everything should work properly! \o/

We hope you enjoy it, so leave a like and subscribe for more updates soon!

Team Vlogger Go Viral

Hey Vloggers!

Main screen visuals
- A lot of stuff from the main screen was changed, and creating videos is cooler than ever!
- Some buttons changed place, like the League button

Subscribers Progress
- Now you can easily see the progress for your next ▶Play Button!

Vlogging Crew
- Call an amazing crew to help you make videos!


We hope you enjoy it, so leave a like and subscribe for more updates soon!

Team Vlogger Go Viral

Hey Vloggers!

Wall of Play Buttons!
- The best place to display and admire your successful career as a vlogger!

Vlogging Crew for real!
- Now the professional crew has really cool animation! Try them out!

Bug fixes!
- Fixed a bunch of bugs and performance issues that you vloggers reported. Thank you!

That's it for now. We hope you enjoy it, so leave a like and subscribe for more updates soon!
